Next your attention turns to the high school aged girl opposite you who was busy texting on her phone. She had bleached blonde hair and was dressed in a skimpy rainbow tank top and a bait of short jean shorts. Your attention is then diverted to a hispanic looking college aged woman who just tripped while disembarking one of the nearby aircraft. The next person you look at is a tall, buff looking male security guard who is busy breaking up an argument between a pair of women passengers. info.brief_description: You gain the ability to swap reflections and shadows with others by looking at them.
info.description:
Your name is Henry Smithworth and you have just graduated from University. It is summer time and you are just returning from an overseas trip to visit your grandparents when you gain the ability to swap reflections and shadows with other people by looking at them and thinking about it.

Power description:
When you swap reflections & shadows with someone, your reflection and shadow is replaced with their own (wearing whatever they are wearing at the time). After the first time you completely undress the reflection will be wearing equivalent clothes to what you put on [if you put on a top(shirt), the reflection will put on a top (maybe a shirt or maybe a tank top…)]. This will even hold true for when there are definite gender differences in clothing [if you don't put on an undershirt, a female reflection will not be wearing a bra]. For haircuts and other obvious differences, your reflection will get/ be holding or wearing stuff similar to what the person whose reflection it is would be doing/holding/getting.

Photos taken of you will still show your regular body and clothes (though still show your alternate reflection. Others will still see you with your own body and will also be able to notice that your reflection and shadow don't match.

Basic rules:
1. Good grammar and no personality changes.
2. just powers described above gan be gained, no others.

Please make additions and I hope you enjoy the story!
